name: Memorecto
description:
Free to play memory puzzle game

How to play:

At first you enter memorizing phase and you have couple of seconds to memorize the number in the open cards. after memorizing phase is done, the next is playing phase. here you have to click the closed cards in number order you've memorized.

Please keep in mind that this game initially designed for mobile so there are numbers of feature that are not working on this pc port, for example the Automatic Sign In feature and the resolution itself is vertical.

This game is made using Godot Engine. If you enjoy this game, please consider a donation to support the development.
